6. Analyze the candidates column for the identified row: Look at the candidates listed for district Massachusetts 12 to see if James A Gallivan (d) is listed as unopposed. In this case, he is listed as unopposed.

7. Make a decision based on the comparison: Since both the incumbent and result columns match the claim's requirements, but the candidates column indicates that James A Gallivan (d) was unopposed (which contradicts the re-elected status), the claim is false.
